title: Flying Kites
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 459 words, Level K (Grade 2), Lexile 500L, Fiction Series
description: Flying Kites is the third in a series of Hoppers stories that portray the Hopper family through different times of the year. It is March, and the little Hoppers go outside to fly their kites against the wishes of their mother. Snubby Nose gets carried away by his kite, and the bunnies learn their lesson.
